plugin.name: Explain Instruction
plugin.description: Displays a window that explains in simple English what an assembly instruction does
plugin.longdescription: Parses the Lifted IL for an instruction and uses it to generate an English description of what an instruction does. Works best on x86 and x86_64. See: https://github.com/ehennenfent/binja_explain_instruction/blob/master/README.md
plugin.author: Eric Hennenfent
